resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete host \'%s\'?
Host can\'t be deleted because it doesn\'t exist.
Host-under-edit changed due to update of the host list.
Set up your device as a trusted device by simply scanning the QR-code generated by the KeeBiometrics KeePass-plugin.

This setup allows you to manually generate a private/public-keypair whichever way you prefer. Note however that your public-key has to be formatted in the DER-encoding for the parser to understand it.\As an example you can convert your standard RSA id-file generated by
$ ssh-keygen -t rsa
to a KeeBiometrics compatible public-key-file using
$ openssl rsa -in id_rsa -pubout -outform DER pub.der
The resulting pub.der can then be imported using the functionality provided below.
Host already exists! A host with the same host-name and public-key already exists.
Secure lock screen has not yet been set up. To continue using this app, please go to Settings and set up a lock screen.
